CREATE TABLE `ims_baoming_reply` ( `id` int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT comment 'id', `rid` int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL default 0 comment '规则id', `title` varchar( 50 ) NOT NULL comment '规则标题', `qi` varchar ( 20 ) not null default '' comment '第几期', `description` varchar( 255 ) NOT NULL comment '描述', `thumb` varchar( 100 ) NOT NULL comment '图片', `bgimage` varchar( 100 ) NOT NULL comment '头部背景图片', `start_time` int unsigned NOT NULL comment '开始时间', `end_time` int unsigned NOT NULL comment '结束时间', `status` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL default 1 comment '开关状态', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
CREATE TABLE `ims_baoming_list` ( `id` int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `rid` int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL , `from_user` varchar(50) not null default '', `name` varchar( 20 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `qq` int unsigned NOT NULL , `tel` varchar(11) NOT NULL default '', `mail` varchar( 50 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `ip` varchar( 15 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
